item.title: Incubation of FUSS!
item.description: We are delighted to announce the official launch of the Formal and Usable Systems Security (FUSS) Group at IIT Gandhinagar! Our mission is to advance the field of cybersecurity through rigorous formal methods and user-centered design principles.
